title: Can you please provide a detailed comparison between DMC Ludhiana, GMC Patiala, GMC Amritsar and GMC Faridkot on the basis of all aspects possible? - Quora

response.answer_text: Order of preference in govt colleges- GMC Patiala> Amritsar> Faridkot This is a multifactorial decision based on faculty, infrastructure and patient in load. Even though Faridkot outcasts Patiala and Amritsar if talking abt infrastructure but it is still new and experience counts in medical field! DMC Ludhiana being a private institution has amazing infrastructure (almost comparable to AIIMS and PGI) but the cost comes a deciding factor here. The overall tution fees of MBBS in govt. Colleges is 4.4 lakhs while that in DMCL (govt quota) is nearly 14–15 lakhs. Hostels are definitely not so great in govt colleges. I hope I could give u a brief about it.

DMC - LUDHIANA IS A PRIVATE MEDICAL COLLEGE WITH VERY GOOD INFRASTRUCTURE REQUIRED FOR MBBS STUDENTS. GMC’S ALL ARE GOVERMENT COLLEGES - EVERYONE KNOW THE THINGS AVAILABLE AT GOVERMENT INSTITUTES . YES FEE IS BIG DIFFERENCE.
